person.persName: Moses Hudleston (Cumberland Co, Ky, farm laborer and second lieutenant)

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Tennessee native. Farm laborer in Cumberland County in 1860. Private in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) from October 28, 1861, to December 31, 1864. Commissioned to serve in the 13th Kentucky Cavalry as second lieutenant, but the commission was cancelled.
